tweet: @jonathanvolk Thanks for adding me to your affiliate marketers list.
Yesterday I spent $159 on PPC (mostly Yahoo) to generate $336 gross =$177 net.
@hanjicode I wouldn't say I'm done with Adwords, but I'm not using them today and would rather not be dependent on big G in any way.
I'm up about $180 for the day on $120 spent.  It's all Yahoo search marketing for me these days.
Today I've spent $111 on PPC with $348 gross = $247 net. I'd make more but my stuff is on auto pilot. With my wife pregnant I barely work.
